net.rcode.nanomaps.overlay
Class UncertaintyHeadingOverlay

java.lang.Object
  View
      net.rcode.nanomaps.overlay.CircleOverlay
          net.rcode.nanomaps.overlay.UncertaintyHeadingOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapStateAware
public class UncertaintyHeadingOverlay
extends CircleOverlay

Extends CircleOverlay to draw an uncertainty circle plus a heading cone. Either the uncertainty circle or the heading cone can be made invisible independently.

Author:
stella

getHeadingConePaint

public Paint getHeadingConePaint()
Returns:
the Paint used to draw the heading cone

getHeadingConeMinRadius

public int getHeadingConeMinRadius()
Minimum radius of the heading cone. If the enclosing circle overlay is >= this size, then the heading cone will be drawn to match the circle. Otherwise, the cone will extrude past the circle to this radius.

Returns:
min radius

setHeadingConeMinRadius

public void setHeadingConeMinRadius(int headingConeMinRadius)
Change the minimum heading cone radius

public float getHeading()

calculateSize

protected int calculateSize()
Description copied from class: CircleOverlay
Calculate the needed size of the display area. The box defined by size must have the anchor point at the center.

This method should also stash any other state it needs to draw. It will only ever be called if mapState!=null

Overrides:
calculateSize in class CircleOverlay
Returns:
size of the drawable area
